Business Information: Rheumatology Associates, P.C. offers professional and personal healthcare for each patient. The practice was founded in 1976 and consists of six board-certified and highly trained physicians that treat rheumatologic diseases. We are closed the first and third Friday of every month.

Street Address: Kirklin Clinic At U A B

Business Name: Dr. Greg E Eudy, MD, PC
Dr. Guy Bryan Dewees III, MD

Business Information: Alabama Orthopedic, Spine & Sports Medicine Associates specializes in providing personalized care. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the organization offers services in the categories of wellness, prevention, conservative treatment, education with state-of-the-art technology. It features on-site digital X-ray, digital MRI, bone density scanner handicapped accessible and in-house comprehensive physical therapy services. The group also manages special problems of the musculoskeletal system, involving diagnosis, treatment, rehabilitation and prevention. It is affiliated with the Medial Center East, Medical Center Blount and St. Clair Regional Hospital.

Business Name: Southlake Orthopaedics Sports Medicine & Spine Center PC
Business Information: Dr. Thomas E. Powell, Dr. Dewey H. Jones III, and Dr. Dewey H. Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. Our doctors offer compassionate orthopedic care and spend ample time listening to their patients to develop customized surgical and non-surgical solutions for relieving pain, stiffness, swelling, and movement limitations. Our physicians are truly dedicated to their craft, treating people with general orthopedic conditions such as fractures, sports injuries, work-related injuries, and joint disease. In addition to performing arthroscopy, joint replacement surgery, and general orthopedic surgery, our surgeons perform surgery for the foot, ankle, hip, knee, shoulder, elbow, and wrist. Some of our physicians also administer ultrasound-guided medication injections to help relieve joint pain.

Rheumatology Associates, P.C. offers professional and personal healthcare for each patient. The practice was founded in 1976 and consists of six board-certified and highly trained physicians that treat rheumatologic diseases. We are closed the first and third Friday of every month.

Street Address: Kirklin Clinic At U A B

Business Name: Dr. Greg E Eudy, MD, PC
Dr. Guy Bryan Dewees III, MD

Business Information: Alabama Orthopedic, Spine & Sports Medicine Associates specializes in providing personalized care. Located in Birmingham, Ala., the organization offers services in the categories of wellness, prevention, conservative treatment, education with state-of-the-art technology. It features on-site digital X-ray, digital MRI, bone density scanner handicapped accessible and in-house comprehensive physical therapy services. The group also manages special problems of the musculoskeletal system, involving diagnosis, treatment, rehabilitation and prevention. It is affiliated with the Medial Center East, Medical Center Blount and St. Clair Regional Hospital.

Business Name: Southlake Orthopaedics Sports Medicine & Spine Center PC
Business Information: Dr. Thomas E. Powell, Dr. Dewey H. Jones III, and Dr. Dewey H. Jones IV are orthopedic surgeons who regard minimally invasive arthroscopic surgery, orthopedic surgery, and regenerative therapies not only as their passion, but also as their calling. Our doctors offer compassionate orthopedic care and spend ample time listening to their patients to develop customized surgical and non-surgical solutions for relieving pain, stiffness, swelling, and movement limitations. Our physicians are truly dedicated to their craft, treating people with general orthopedic conditions such as fractures, sports injuries, work-related injuries, and joint disease. In addition to performing arthroscopy, joint replacement surgery, and general orthopedic surgery, our surgeons perform surgery for the foot, ankle, hip, knee, shoulder, elbow, and wrist. Some of our physicians also administer ultrasound-guided medication injections to help relieve joint pain.

Dr. Carter is an obstetrician-gynecologist in Birmingham, Alabama. She completed her OB/GYN residency at the University of Tennessee Chattanooga and a Preventive Medicine residency at the University of Colorado. 
 
Dr. Carter’s interests include general obstetrics, office gynecology, gynecologic surgery, and healthy lifestyle coaching. She has a passion for coaching women in how to implement healthy lifestyle changes to prevent chronic disease, lose and maintain a healthy weight, and experience healthy pregnancies. Dr. Carter is board certified in Public Health and General Preventive Medicine. Public health and general preventive medicine focus on promoting health, preventing disease, and managing the health of communities and defined populations. 
 
Dr. Carter is currently seeing patients in our main office (Birmingham), but also sees patients in Trussville every other Monday.

In addition to performing arthroscopy, joint replacement surgery, and general orthopedic surgery, our surgeons perform surgery for the foot, ankle, hip, knee, shoulder, elbow, and wrist. Some of our physicians also administer ultrasound-guided medication injections to help relieve joint pain.

Dr. Carter is an obstetrician-gynecologist in Birmingham, Alabama. She completed her OB/GYN residency at the University of Tennessee Chattanooga and a Preventive Medicine residency at the University of Colorado. 
 
Dr. Carter’s interests include general obstetrics, office gynecology, gynecologic surgery, and healthy lifestyle coaching. She has a passion for coaching women in how to implement healthy lifestyle changes to prevent chronic disease, lose and maintain a healthy weight, and experience healthy pregnancies. Dr. Carter is board certified in Public Health and General Preventive Medicine. Public health and general preventive medicine focus on promoting health, preventing disease, and managing the health of communities and defined populations. 
 
Dr. Carter is currently seeing patients in our main office (Birmingham), but also sees patients in Trussville every other Monday.
